english.segment1: This is our song that Jesus is alive. . In a world thats losing ground. . He is the lifeline. . He is our hope, for now and ever. . The Son who never dies. . No greater love in life
english.segment2: Jesus is alive today. . See His saving grace. . Now and ever
english.segment3: Jesus opened up the way. . With truth will never fades
english.segment5: Came to earth to be with us
english.segment7: Son of God, the Risen One
english.segment9: Opened eyes and hearts set free
